org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSLocalFileProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSLocalFileProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncFSFileProvider

    public class EncFSLocalFileProvider
extends Object
implements EncFSFileProvider
    Class implementing an EncFSFileProvider for accessing the local filesystem

    Note that all path parameters are relative to the rootPath provided to the constructor. Thus, if one instantiates an EncFSFileProvider("/home/jdoe"), the proper way to refer to /home/jdoe/dir/file.ext is by "dir/file.ext".
